16. Sabbath School Work.--"It is also the Lord's design that our schools shall give young people a training which will prepare them to teach in any department of the Sabbath school, or to discharge the duties in any of its offices. We should see a different state of affairs, if a number of consecrated young persons would devote themselves to the Sabbath school work, taking pains to educate themselves, and then to instruct others as 
                                                                           35
to the best methods to be employed in leading souls to Christ. This is a line of work that brings returns."--Test., Vol. VI, p. 136.
